name: GitaChanting
0:
”Alexa, open Gita Chanting for chapter four and verse seven”
”Alexa, open Gita Chanting for chapter twelve”
”Alexa, open Gita Chanting for chapter eighteen verse twenty three with meaning”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gita chanting
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn to chant Bhagavad Gita (also known as "Song of God") verses with the right spaṣṭatā (clarity in pronunciation), melodious rāga (tune) and accurate splitting of words (Sandhi). Recited by Swami Harshananda Maharaj, an eminent scholarly Monk on Hinduism from Ramakrishna Order. This skill contains all the 700 Sanskrit Verses with English Meanings from the Bhagavad Gita book published by Ramakrishna Math Chennai and can be invoked by saying the Chapter Number and the Verse number with meaning.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
